title: ABGs NOW! Lite 12+
appDescription: ABGs NOW!™ is a fun, engaging way for both students and professionals to strengthen their knowledge of arterial blood gases. The app features a calculator, providing immediate answers, a practice mode that guides the learner with helpful hints, and a challenge mode where learners can put their ABG skills to the test. Both practice and challenge modes provide detailed analysis for any missed interpretations. ​ ABGs NOW!™ offers an entertaining way to learn a challenging topic.

reviews.title:
App malfunctions

    Developer Response
reviews.review: The app is a great idea however when in the practice mode and you pick the correct answer it will tell you are wrong more than half the time and then give you the correct answer in explanation often times being the exact answer i chose. Tried closing and restarting the app several times with the same outcomes. Needs to be fixed. more We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of ABGs NOW! and are sorry that you are experiencing problems with the app. Please feel free to reach out to us through our support email so that we can further diagnose your problem. more
